titleInfo.title: Frederick Gioia, Neurosurgeon at St. Joseph, 1968

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS 3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America, using a stylesheet available at https://github.com/digitallibraryoftennessee/DLTN_XSLT. mods.abstract: This is an interview with Dr. Frederick Gioia. Neurosurgeon attached to St. Joseph and called to emergency room when Martin Luther King brought in after shooting.
